title: AI Notifications (on Android)
description: 🚀 AI Notifications – Smarter Alerts! AI-powered summaries for SMS, WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack & more—no more clutter! ✅ Smart summaries ✅ Suggested replies ✅ Auto-dismiss old notifications ✅ Ultra low cost (ChatGPT-4o-mini) Requires a free OpenAI API key.
